abstract: United States and China agree on draft resolution to expand United Nations Security Council sanctions against North Korea over its latest nuclear test.
lead_paragraph: The United States and China have agreed on a draft resolution to expand United Nations Security Council sanctions against North Korea over its latest nuclear test.

headline.main: Progress Reported in North Korea Talks
headline.print_headline: United Nations; Progress Reported in North Korea Talks

snippet: The United States and China have agreed on a draft resolution to expand United Nations Security Council sanctions against North Korea over its latest nuclear test.
